name: Skywings Paragliding
about: Skywings Paragliding is an international flying school with locations in Cape Town, South Africa, Oludeniz, Turkey, and Interlaken, Switzerland. With over 30 years of experience and a 100% safety record, our highly qualified instructors, certified by SAHPA, THK, and SHPA, ensure a safe and thrilling experience. We offer tandem paragliding flights, paragliding courses, and tours, capturing your adventure with the latest GoPro cameras. Our priority is your safety, comfort, and enjoyment, making every flight a memorable event. Join us to experience the magic of paragliding in some of the world's most spectacular locations.
